issue.title: [Rust] Umbrella issue for clippy integration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9978](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9978). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is an umbrella issue to collate outstanding and new tasks to enable clippy integration

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9978?focusedCommentId=17332256) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
